data.meta_site_name: School of Visual Arts | SVA | New York City
data.text:
SVA Features - Phil Jimenez 03:52

Phil Jimenez is an American comic book artist and writer, known for his work as writer/artist on Wonder Woman from 2000 to 2003, as well as several other characters and storylines from DC Comics, Marvel Comics and more. He teaches in the BFA Cartooning program at SVA, and incorporates many different dynamic elements into figure drawing including character and narrative. Featuring: Phil Jimenez, Faculty Chris Jessick (BFA Film and Video 2006), Director, Producer, Cinematographer Javier De Pablos Velez (BFA Film and Video 2013), Associate Producer, Cinematographer Miwa Sakulrat (BFA Film 2017), Editor
